00239 inline RVector::RVector(int_T dim)
00240 {
00241     D=dim;
00242     T=new real_T[D];
00243     Shared=false;
00244 }
00245 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00246 inline RVector::RVector(void)
00247 {
00248     D=0;
00249     T=NULL;
00250     Shared=false;
00251 }
00252 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00253 inline RVector::RVector(int_T dim,real_T *t)
00254 {
00255     D=dim;
00256     T=t;
00257     Shared=true;
00258 }
00259 
00260 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00261 inline RVector::RVector(const RVector &V)
00262 {
00263     D=V.D;
00264     T=new real_T[D];
00265 
00266     memcpy((void*)T,(void*)V.T, D*sizeof(real_T) );
00267 
00268     Shared=false;
00269 }
00270 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00271 inline RVector::RVector(IVector &V)
00272 {
00273     D=V.Size();
00274     T=new real_T[D];
00275     for (int_T i=0;i<D;i++)
00276         T[i]=V[i];
00277     Shared=false;
00278 }
00279 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00280 inline void RVector::Empty(void)
00281 {
00282     if (D!=0)
00283     {
00284         if (!Shared)
00285             delete [] T;
00286         T=NULL;
00287         D=0;
00288         Shared=false;
00289     }
00290 }
00291 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00292 inline RVector::~RVector(void)
00293 {
00294     Empty();
00295 }
00296 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00297 inline void RVector::ShareArray(const RVector & V)
00298 {
00299     Empty();
00300     Shared=true;
00301     D=V.D;
00302     T=V.T;
00303 }
00304 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------

00306 {
00307     Empty();
00308     D=dim;
00309     T=new real_T[D];
00310 }

00321 {
00322     return Shared;
00323 }
00324 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00325 inline void RVector::operator=(const RVector &V)
00326 {
00327     if (D==V.D)
00328         memcpy((void*)T,(void*)V.T, D*sizeof(real_T) );
00329     else
00330     {
00331       if (!Shared)
00332       {
00333         Empty();
00334         D=V.D;
00335         T=new real_T[D];
00336         memcpy((void*)T,(void*)V.T, D*sizeof(real_T) );
00337       }
00338       else
00339       {
00340         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: Unable to affect a %i RVector to a shared %i RVector.\n",V.D,D);
00341         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00342       }
00343 
00344 
00345     }
00346 }
00347 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00348 inline real_T* RVector::GetArrayAddress(void)
00349 {
00350     return T;
00351 }
00352 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00353 inline void RVector::Init(real_T x)
00354 {
00355     int_T i=D;
00356     real_T* P=T;
00357     for (;i--;P++)
00358         *P=x;
00359 }

00392 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00393 inline void RVector::operator+=(const RVector & V)
00394 {
00395     if (D!=V.D)
00396     {
00397         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: Unable to add a RVector of size %i to a RVector of size %i.\n",V.D,D);
00398         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00399     }
00400     else
00401     {
00402         int_T   i=D;
00403         real_T* P=T;
00404         real_T* S=V.T;
00405         for (;i--;P++,S++)
00406             *P+=(*S);
00407     }
00408 }
00409 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00410 inline void RVector::operator-=(const RVector & V)
00411 {
00412     if (D!=V.D)
00413     {
00414         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: Unable to substract a RVector of size %i to a RVector of size %i.\n",V.D,D);
00415         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00416     }
00417     else
00418     {
00419         int_T   i=D;
00420         real_T* P=T;
00421         real_T* S=V.T;
00422         for (;i--;P++,S++)
00423             *P-=(*S);
00424     }
00425 }
00426 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00427 inline void RVector::operator*=(const RVector & V)
00428 {

00430     {
00431         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: Unable to multiply a RVector of size %i to a RVector of size %i.\n",V.D,D);
00432         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00433     }
00434     else
00435     {
00436         int_T   i=D;
00437         real_T* P=T;
00438         real_T* S=V.T;
00439         for (;i--;P++,S++)
00440             *P*=(*S);
00441     }
00442 }
00443 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00444 inline void RVector::operator/=(const RVector & V)
00445 {
00446     if (D!=V.D)
00447     {
00448         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: Unable to divide a RVector of size %i to a RVector of size %i.\n",V.D,D);
00449         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00450     }
00451     else
00452     {
00453         int_T   i=D;
00454         real_T* P=T;
00455         real_T* S=V.T;
00456         for (;i--;P++,S++)
00457             *P/=(*S);
00458     }
00459 }
00460 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00461 inline real_T RVector::operator*(const RVector & V)
00462 {
00463     real_T  R=0;
00464     if (D!=V.D)
00465     {
00466         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: Unable to do the dot product of a RVector of size %i with a RVector of size %i.\n",V.D,D);
00467         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00468     }
00469     else
00470     {   
00471         int_T   i=D;
00472         real_T* P=T;
00473         real_T* S=V.T;
00474         
00475         for (;i--;P++,S++)
00476             R+=(*P)*(*S);
00477     }
00478     return R;
00479 }
00480 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00481 inline RVector RVector::operator+(const RVector & V) // improvable
00482 {
00483     RVector     result(D);
00484     int_T       i;
00485     
00486     if (D!=V.D)
00487     {
00488         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: Unable to add a RVector of size %i to a RVector of size %i.\n",V.D,D);
00489         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00490     }
00491     else
00492     {   
00493         for(i=0; i<D; i++)
00494             result[i] = T[i] + V.T[i];
00495     }
00496     return result;
00497 }
00498 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00499 inline RVector RVector::operator-(const RVector & V) // improvable
00500 {
00501     RVector     result(D);
00502     int_T       i;
00503     
00504     if (D!=V.D)
00505     {
00506         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: Unable to substract a RVector of size %i to a RVector of size %i.\n",V.D,D);
00507         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00508     }
00509     else
00510     {   
00511         for(i=0; i<D; i++)
00512             result[i] = T[i] - V.T[i];
00513     }
00514     return result;
00515 }
00516 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00517 inline RVector RVector::operator+(real_T x)
00518 {
00519     RVector result(*this);
00520     result+=x;
00521     return result;
00522 }
00523 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00524 inline RVector RVector::operator-(real_T x)
00525 {
00526     RVector result(*this);
00527     result-=x;
00528     return result;
00529 }
00530 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00531 inline RVector RVector::operator*(real_T x)
00532 {
00533     RVector result(*this);
00534     result*=x;
00535     return result;
00536 }
00537 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00538 inline RVector RVector::operator/(real_T x)
00539 {
00540     RVector result(*this);
00541     result/=x;
00542     return result;
00543 }
00544 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00545 inline bool RVector::operator==(const RVector &V)  // improvable
00546 {
00547     int_T i=0;
00548     bool res;
00549     if (V.D==D)
00550     {
00551         while ((i<D)&&(EqualityReal(T[i],V.T[i]))) 
00552             i++;
00553         res=(i==D);
00554     }
00555     else
00556         res=false;
00557     return res;
00558 }
00559 
00560 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00561 inline bool RVector::Include(real_T x)  // improvable
00562 {   
00563     int_T i=0;
00564     bool res;
00565     
00566     while ((i<D)&&(!EqualityReal(T[i],x))) 
00567         i++;
00568     res=(i<D);
00569     return res;
00570 }
00571 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00572 inline real_T & RVector::operator[](int_T i)
00573 {
00574     if ((i<0)||(i>=D))
00575     {
00576         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: RVector index overflow ! %i inferior to 0 or superior to %i.\n",i,D-1);
00577         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00578     }
00579     return T[i];
00580 }
00581 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00582 inline real_T & RVector::operator()(int_T i)
00583 {
00584     if ((i<0)||(i>=D))
00585     {
00586         sprintf(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER,"EasyLink error: RVector index overflow ! %i inferior to 0 or superior to %i\n",i,D-1);
00587         mexErrMsgTxt(ERROR_MSG_BUFFER);
00588     }
00589     return T[i];
00590 }

00601 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00602 inline real_T RVector::Max(void)  // improvable
00603 {
00604     int_T i;
00605     real_T m=T[0];
00606     for (i=1; i<D; i++)
00607         if (T[i]>m)
00608             m=T[i];
00609     return m;
00610 }
00611 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00612 inline real_T RVector::Min(void)  // improvable
00613 {
00614     int_T i;
00615     real_T m=T[0];
00616     for (i=1; i<D; i++)
00617         if (T[i]<m)
00618             m=T[i];
00619     return m;
00620 }
00621 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00622 inline IVector RVector::ArgMax(void)  // improvable
00623 {
00624     int_T max,i,nb;
00625     int_T *Choix;
00626     Choix=new int_T[D];
00627 
00628     max=0;
00629     Choix[0]=0;
00630     nb=1;
00631     for (i=1;i<D;i++)
00632         if (EqualityReal(T[i],T[max]))
00633         {
00634             Choix[nb]=i;
00635             nb++;
00636         }
00637         else if (T[i]>T[max])
00638         {
00639             Choix[0]=i;
00640             nb=1;
00641             max=i;
00642         }
00643     IVector C(nb);
00644     for (int_T j=0;j<C.Size();j++)
00645         C[j]=Choix[j];
00646 
00647     delete [] Choix;
00648     return C;
00649 }
00650 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00651 inline IVector RVector::ArgMin(void)  // improvable
00652 {
00653     int_T min,i,nb;
00654     int_T *Choix;
00655     Choix=new int_T[D];
00656 
00657     min=0;
00658     Choix[0]=0;
00659     nb=1;
00660     for (i=1;i<D;i++)
00661         if (EqualityReal(T[i],T[min]))
00662         {
00663             Choix[nb]=i;
00664             nb++;
00665         }
00666         else if (T[i]<T[min])
00667         {
00668             Choix[0]=i;
00669             nb=1;
00670             min=i;
00671         }
00672     IVector C(nb);
00673     for (int_T j=0;j<C.Size();j++)
00674         C[j]=Choix[j];
00675 
00676     delete [] Choix;
00677     return C;
00678 }
00679 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00680 inline int_T RVector::FirstArgMax(void)  // improvable
00681 {
00682     int_T i,imax;
00683     real_T max;
00684     
00685     max=T[0];
00686     imax=0;
00687     for (i=1;i<D;i++)
00688         if (T[i]>max)
00689         {
00690             max=T[i];
00691             imax=i;
00692         }
00693     
00694     return imax;
00695 }
00696 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00697 inline int_T RVector::FirstArgMin(void)  // improvable
00698 {
00699     int_T i,imin;
00700     real_T min;
00701     
00702     min=T[0];
00703     imin=0;
00704     for (i=1;i<D;i++)
00705         if (T[i]>min)
00706         {
00707             min=T[i];
00708             imin=i;
00709         }
00710     
00711     return imin;
00712 }
00713 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00714 inline real_T RVector::Norm1()  // improvable
00715 {
00716    real_T n=0;
00717    for (int_T i=0;i<D;i++)
00718         n+=Abs(T[i]);
00719    return n;
00720 }
00721 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00722 inline real_T RVector::Norm2()  // improvable
00723 {
00724    real_T n=0;
00725    for (int_T i=0;i<D;i++)
00726         n+=T[i]*T[i];
00727    return sqrt(n);
00728 }
00729 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00730 inline void RVector::Printf(char * Format)
00731 {
00732     printf("[");
00733     for (int_T i=0;i<D;i++)
00734     {
00735         printf(Format,T[i]);
00736     }
00737     printf("]\n");
00738 }
